> <OLD>
>
> Nightlight was in conmotion but she was unharmed. She didnt said anythign
> and didnt stopped to shake

<NEW>

A light flares on as figure in the dark turned on something akin to a
flashlight. "You're a Maximal aren't you?" One of the voices said. "We
gotta move, we burnt up a lot of time commin to get you, but stretch
over there wanted . . . "

"That's enough Cohrada. We have protocol to follow and no Maximal will
be left behind." The first voice said.

Turning back to NIGHTLIGHT he continued, "I am Longrack." The voice
said. In the light that was shining he could be seen as a tall and
robust soldier, predominantly yellow/orange in the light with brown
spots. His right hand ending in a claw rather than normal fingers.

Another voice spoke up in the dark, "Protocol is not going to matter
much if we're dead, we gotta move, now. More of those things are going
to be coming soon."

The door opened and light spilled into the room revealing that the
SHARKTICONS had been knocked against the walls and five figures stood
in the room all of them with MAXIMAL emblems, one of them was the
LONGRACK who had been talking.

"If you want to live you will come with us." Said one of the other
figures, a shorter one with black and white armor who looked like his
beastmode was a penguin.

(TAG)

- Preston
